1893) Swinhoe by Sharpe (31

Hills Road 
Cambridge 
May 12th 1893

To the Secretaries of the Royal Society.

Gentlemen, 
Herewith I return 
to you Colonel C. Swinhoe's 
paper '' On the mimetic 
forms of certain butterflies
of the genus Hypolimnas''.
It is no possible for me
to consider this paper as an 
important scientific con-
